name: Blackjack 'n Roll
description:
Blackjack 'n Roll

Roll the dice to attack your opponent in combats based on blackjack rules.

Rules

Defeat your enemy by rolling the highest score possible without exceeding 21.

May the dice be with you !

Credits

Game by Lavande Potions - lavande-potions
Made in 72h for the mini-jam-124-warmth
